title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. XV, pt. 381 - Life Settlements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. XV, pt. 381 - Life Settlements

State Regulations
§ 381.1 - License fees and financial accountability requirements for life settlement providers
§ 381.2 - License fees for life settlement brokers
§ 381.3 - Registration fees for life settlement intermediaries

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. XV, pt. 381

Statutory authority: Financial Services Law, §§
202, 301, 302; Insurance Law, §§201,301, 2137, 7803, 7804, 7817; L. 2009, ch. 499, § 21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
